title: Improve torch.autograd.Function documentation
body_html:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/autograd.html#torch.autograd.Function

It's missing:

  • an example of how to define a function
  • the signature of forward and backward
  • backward says "All arguments are tensors". I don't think this is true anymore

It also has information that's not relevant to the API, such as "almost all of it was moved to our C backend"

body:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/autograd.html#torch.autograd.Function

It's missing:

- an example of how to define a function
- the signature of forward and backward
- backward says "All arguments are tensors". I don't think this is true anymore

It also has information that's not relevant to the API, such as "almost all of it was moved to our C backend"
